website_summaries.verdict: If you have a younger rider with special needs, this trike is definitely one to consider. Multiple seat angle adjustments are possible, and the steering is very intuitive.

customer_reviews.title: Mobo cruiser for the WIN!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6-year-old little girl with Cerebral Palsy. She has desperately wanted a bike for a while and wanted to be "speedy" like her big brothers. But adaptive bikes are EXPENSIVE not to mention big and bulky. We heard about Mobo through a Facebook friend whose child also has CP. They had gotten a Mobo for their child and adapted it with pedal straps and a harness. We decided to go for it. After some adjustments; pedal straps, the Mobo Mini seatbelt/harness and a lot of practice, our little girl is now speedy. Thanks for making a great bike, Mobo!!

product_meta.title: Mobo Triton Pedal Go Kart Trike. Kids 3-Wheel Bike. Youth Cruiser Tricycle
product_meta.description:
A recumbent bike for kids who want a little exercise. Designed for cruising on flat paved surfaces and gently sloping terrain, this youth tricycle is great way for your child to keep fit and enjoy the outdoors.

 Ride with confidence! Low center of gravity on this youth recumbent bike provides unprecedented stability. No balance required. Dual-joystick steering offers smooth maneuverability with simple hand movements. 

 Trike recumbent bikes are more comfortable – the ergonomic recumbent seat provides evenly cushioned back support. A 3-wheel bike for girls and boys who prefer a more secure, comfortable ride than a standard upright bicycle.
